DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Magma Rebuffs California Energy Bid : The San Diego-based power supplier said its board unanimously rejected the revised California Energy Co . offer for about 51 % of Magma Power Co. ' s stock , finding that it is not in the best interests of Magma stockholders.Omaha-based California Energy on Oct . 19 raised its offer to $ 38.50 per Magma share from $ 35 . The new bid consists_of $ 28.50 in cash and $ 10 in_stock per share for 12.4 million Magma shares . In making the rejection , Magma said it considered a variety of factors , including the revised offer ' s conditional nature and the terms of California Energy ' s financing .
